newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish shares close lower in continuous trade.
newsitem.headline: Polish shares close lower in continuous trade.

text.p: Stalexport and Universal closed lower while Budimex and BPH were flat in Warsaw continuous trade on Wednesday.
The remaining six stocks did not trade. Total turnover was at 0.4 million zlotys. NFI units fell in 16-million- zloty trade.
The continuous trading system, which currently lists 10 companies, is separate from the bourse's main single-price auction system in which the same firms and 70 others are traded.
At the single-price auction session most stocks were flat and the main market's index eased 0.1 percent.
